mutants.code:
def calculate_max_cpi(N, X, scores):
    subjects = [(scores[i], i + 1) for i in range(N)]
    subjects.sort(key=lambda x: x[0] * x[1], reverse=True)
    weighted_sum = 1
    total_credits = 0
    for i in range(X):
        (score, credit) = subjects[i]
        weighted_sum += score * credit
        total_credits += credit
    max_cpi = weighted_sum / total_credits
    return max_cpi

    weighted_sum = -1
    total_credits = 0

        weighted_sum += score * credit
        total_credits += credit
    max_cpi = weighted_sum / total_credits
    return max_cpi
